de.dhbw.ravensburg.verteiltesysteme.client

Class CommandLineClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dhbw.ravensburg.verteiltesysteme.client.Client
      • de.dhbw.ravensburg.verteiltesysteme.client.CommandLineClient

  • public class CommandLineClient
extends Client
    This class is the CLI Client implementation for communications with the server. It extends the abstract Client class and parses command line parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run(java.lang.String[] args)
        Parse the passed command line arguments to create a RPC request with the SamplingMessageGrpcService. In case a mandatory argument is missing, the program shuts down with an error message.
        Specified by:
        run in class Client
        Parameters:
        args - Command line arguments passed to the JAR call

      • createSamplingMessage

        private void createSamplingMessage(org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine commandLine,
                                   de.dhbw.ravensburg.verteiltesysteme.de.dhbw.ravensburg.verteiltesysteme.rpc.SamplingMessageGrpc.SamplingMessageBlockingStub samplingMessageBlockingStub)
        Create an empty sampling message. Expected arguments are: -d for the duration the message should be valid -n for the name the message should bare If the message name is already in use, an error is returned by the server with the status code CONFLICT. A successful request returns a status code SUCCESS.
        Parameters:
        commandLine - CommandLine Object for argument extraction
        samplingMessageBlockingStub - The message stub that executes the sampling message request

      • writeSamplingMessage

        private void writeSamplingMessage(org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine commandLine,
                                  de.dhbw.ravensburg.verteiltesysteme.de.dhbw.ravensburg.verteiltesysteme.rpc.SamplingMessageGrpc.SamplingMessageBlockingStub samplingMessageBlockingStub)
        Write an existing sampling message. Expected arguments are: -d for the duration the message should be valid -c for the content of the message -n for the name the message should bare If the message name is unknown the server returns a status code NOT_FOUND and SUCCESS otherwise.
        Parameters:
        commandLine - CommandLine Object for argument extraction
        samplingMessageBlockingStub - The message stub that executes the sampling message request

      • clearSamplingMessage

        private void clearSamplingMessage(org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine commandLine,
                                  de.dhbw.ravensburg.verteiltesysteme.de.dhbw.ravensburg.verteiltesysteme.rpc.SamplingMessageGrpc.SamplingMessageBlockingStub samplingMessageBlockingStub)
        Clear an existing sampling message of its content. The message is also invalidated. Expected arguments are: -n for the name of the message to be cleared If the message name is unknown the server returns a status code NOT_FOUND and SUCCESS otherwise.
        Parameters:
        commandLine - CommandLine Object for argument extraction
        samplingMessageBlockingStub - The message stub that executes the sampling message request

      • readSamplingMessage

        private void readSamplingMessage(org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine commandLine,
                                 de.dhbw.ravensburg.verteiltesysteme.de.dhbw.ravensburg.verteiltesysteme.rpc.SamplingMessageGrpc.SamplingMessageBlockingStub samplingMessageBlockingStub)
        Read an existing sampling message. Expected arguments are: -n for the name of the message to be read If the message name is unknown the server returns a status code NOT_FOUND and SUCCESS otherwise.
        Parameters:
        commandLine - CommandLine Object for argument extraction
        samplingMessageBlockingStub - The message stub that executes the sampling message request

      • getSamplingMessageStatus

      • deleteSamplingMessage

        private void deleteSamplingMessage(org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine commandLine,
                                   de.dhbw.ravensburg.verteiltesysteme.de.dhbw.ravensburg.verteiltesysteme.rpc.SamplingMessageGrpc.SamplingMessageBlockingStub samplingMessageBlockingStub)
        Delete an existing sampling message, permanently removing it from the server storage. Expected arguments are: -n for the name of the message to be deleted If the message name is unknown the server returns a status code NOT_FOUND and SUCCESS otherwise.
        Parameters:
        commandLine - CommandLine Object for argument extraction
        samplingMessageBlockingStub - The message stub that executes the sampling message request

      • exitWithError

        Prints an error message before exiting the program with an error exit code of 1.
        Parameters:
        errorMessage - Message to be displayed on the console during the program shutdown
